name: Zoria
description:
A text-based adventure from OwlTech Interactive. Zoria finds you after you've awoken in an obscure bunker amidst a beautiful green landscape. Who are you? Where are you? Perhaps the answer lies somewhere in this unfamiliar land.

Please note, the game is still under active development. New features and areas are being added with every update. 

If interested, you can talk with the development team, as well as other players, through our Discord server: https://discord.gg/82ahxcG
